com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.cql

Class BatchStatementBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.cql.StatementBuilder<BatchStatementBuilder,BatchStatement>
      • com.datastax.oss.driver.api.core.cql.BatchStatementBuilder

  • @NotThreadSafe
public class BatchStatementBuilder
extends StatementBuilder<BatchStatementBuilder,BatchStatement>
    A builder to create a batch statement.

    This class is mutable and not thread-safe.
